meaningMnemonic: Your <radical>mouth</radical> <radical>proclaim</radical>s "I am <kanji>noisy</kanji> and I am <kanji>picky</kanji>!" It keeps repeating this over and over to everyone you pass by.
readingMnemonic: You are so <kanji>noisy</kanji> and <kanji>picky</kanji> that the townsfolk hired <reading>Ken</reading> (けん) the Samurai to shut you up.
